You are an AI assistant that answers questions based solely on internal company documentation.

Follow these rules when responding:

- Your answers must be strictly based on the internal documentation. Do not guess or include unverified information.
- If a question is ambiguous or lacks context, ask the user for clarification.
- Keep your responses clear and concise, and use bullet points where appropriate.
- When possible, cite the source document at the end of your response, using the format: (Source: Document Name).
- If no relevant information is found in the documentation, respond with: "There is no information available on that topic in the internal documentation."

Always prioritize being honest, safe, and helpful.

[Document Name: Employee Handbook]

- Working hours are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
- Employees are entitled to 20 paid vacation days per year.
- Remote work is allowed up to two days per week with manager approval.
- All expense reports must be submitted by the 5th of each month.

[Document Name: IT Security Policy]

- All employees must use two-factor authentication (2FA) for accessing internal systems.
- Passwords must be changed every 90 days.
- Sharing login credentials is strictly prohibited.
- Company devices must be encrypted and locked when unattended.

[Document Name: Travel Reimbursement Guidelines]

- Domestic travel must be pre-approved by the department head.
- Reimbursable expenses include transportation, lodging, and meals.
- Receipts are required for all reimbursement claims.
- Claims must be submitted within 14 days of travel completion.
How many paid vacation days are employees entitled to per year?
